summary: DRIVING ALONG TODAY AND CAME TO A RED LIGHT. HAD TO STOP AND SUDDENLY THE BRAKE DIDN'T WORK LIKE IT NORMALLY DID. HAD TO STEP ON THE PEDAL ALL THE WAY TO THE FLOOR TO STOP. ALMOST HIT THE CAR AHEAD OF ME. BRAKING WAS THE SAME FOR THE NEXT 4 MILES TILL I GOT HOME. HAD TO STEP ON THE PEDAL ALL THE WAY TO THE GROUND TO STOP. THE LOW BRAKE FLUID LIGHT CAME ON THE DASH. AFTER PARKING THE CAR I CHECKED OUT THE BRAKE FLUID RESERVOIR AND IT WAS EMPTY. FILLED IT UP WITH DOT 3 FLUID AND CAME BACK ABOUT 10 MINUTES LATER AND THERE WAS A PUDDLE UNDER WHERE THE BRAKE ACTUATOR IS.
